name: Atera Chronicles
description:
The game is set on the planet Atera, where the last remnants of human civilization are battling it out for Nifrantzia Crystals. These crystals hold tremendous power which could propel humans back to the stars from which they came.

A young man must scour a continent looking for his family amongst a violent revolution taking place all around him. Along the way encountering tribes, armies and mystical beings.

Making tough decision's he must pave his way to save his family or simply survive.
